content:
$f$ is a continuous piecewise linear function defined as follows:

$\qquad f(x) = \begin{cases}
1.2x+11 & , &  [-10,-5) \\\\
0.5x+7.5 & , & [-5,1)\\\\
-x+9 & , & [1,7)\\\\
-{\dfrac{1}{3}}x+{\dfrac{13}{3}} & , & [7,10] \end{cases}$

**Drag the ends of the segments below to graph $f$.**
